title: Registering for the Gym
text: Registration for the gym can be done at any point during the semester, provided there are seats available in your slot of choice. The fee is Rs 500 for one semester. Forms can be collected from the gym office. The fee has to be paid in favour of an account number mentioned on the form (Technology Student's Gymkhana) , you can do it either by submitting the sum at SBI Branch IIT Kharagpur or via Internet Banking. You can also pay via UPI app and print the receipt. You will also have to get the signature of a medical officer on the form , you can get it easily at BC Roy Technology Hospital.

title: Gym Timings
text:
Morning-
slot A 6:00 AM - 6:45 AM
slot B 6:45 AM - 7:30 AM
slot C 7:30 AM - 8:15 AM
Evening
slot D 4:15 PM - 5:00 PM
slot E 5:00 PM - 5:45 PM
slot F 5:45 PM - 6:30 PM
slot G 6:30 PM - 7:15 PM
slot H 7:15 PM - 8:00 PM
